Hub Ivoire Tech a pour vocation d'être l: Hub Ivoire Tech aims to be the largest Startup Campus in Africa. It brings together an ecosystem of incubators, accelerators, investors, experts, and entrepreneurs to stimulate innovation and transform ideas into concrete success stories in Ivory Coast and beyond.
Nous offrons une gamme complète de servi: We offer a comprehensive range of services to support entrepreneurs at every stage of their development: incubation and acceleration programs (with coaching, mentoring, and masterclasses), modern coworking spaces, equipped meeting rooms, relaxation areas, innovation fablab, and administrative support to facilitate your procedures.
Comment puis-je réserver une visite du c: How can I book a campus visit?
Il vous suffit de remplir le formulaire: Simply fill out the visit booking form on our website with your contact information, preferred date and time, and the purpose of your visit. Once your request is submitted, our team will contact you to confirm and finalize your appointment.
Qui peut bénéficier de vos programmes d': Who can benefit from your support programs?
Nos programmes s'adressent aux startups,: Our programs are designed for startups, project leaders, and entrepreneurs eager to bring their ideas to life. Whether you're in the creation phase or growing rapidly, Hub Ivoire Tech offers tailored support to boost your development through a network of experts and strategic partners.
Comment rester informé·e des actualités: How can I stay informed about news and events?
Pour être tenu·e au courant de nos derni: To stay up to date with our latest news, training sessions, hackathons, and other events, subscribe to our newsletter and enable WhatsApp notifications. You'll receive all important information and opportunities offered by Hub Ivoire Tech directly in your inbox or on your phone.
Restez informé des dernières nouvelles e: Stay informed about the latest news and events from Hub Ivoire Tech

Hub Ivoire Tech is a public sector initi: Hub Ivoire Tech est une initiative du secteur public qui vise à stimuler l'innovation en Côte d'Ivoire, favoriser la création de solutions technologiques et renforcer la compétitivité du pays sur la scène internationale.
Incentive measures and grants for innova: Dispositifs incitatifs et subventions pour les entrepreneurs innovants.
Collaborations with global technology hu: Collaborations avec des hubs technologiques mondiaux.
